DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial evaluate safety effectiveness one dose strength denufosol compare placebo patient mild CF lung disease .
DOC.brief_title: Study Denufosol Inhalation Solution Patients With Mild Cystic Fibrosis Lung Disease
DOC.criteria: Have confirm diagnosis cystic fibrosis Have FEV1 great equal 75 % predict normal age , gender , height Be able reproducibly perform spirometry maneuver Be clinically stable least 4 week prior screen Have abnormal renal liver function Have chest xray screen suggest clinically significant active pulmonary disease Be colonize Burkholderia cepacia Have lung transplant
